author: Corinne Ramey
title: Harvey Weinstein to Surrender in New York Sex-Crimes Case
text:
Harvey Weinstein, the veteran Hollywood producer, is expected to turn himself in to authorities Friday in connection with a sex-crimes investigation, people familiar with the matter said Thursday.
Mr. Weinstein is expected to face charges in connection with Lucia Evans, who has alleged that Mr. Weinstein forced her to perform oral sex on him in New York City in 2004 when she was an aspiring actress, according to a law-enforcement official familiar with the matter. The official said there could be other allegations connected... RELATED VIDEO How Harvey and Bob Weinstein Built an Independent Film Empire Through Miramax and then The Weinstein Company, Harvey and Bob Weinstein became two of the leading forces behind the independent film movement of the 1990s -- in the process making millions of dollars and earning more than 200 Oscar nominations. WSJ's Mark Kelly reports.
